document_data.mainbody:
The Blackule Lane was a street in the Blacklake District of Neverwinter.
As of 1480 DR, the Blackule Lane was one of the few streets still operational in Neverwinter after the Ruining of 1451 DR.As the material in Ed Greenwood Presents Elminsters Forgotten Realms is intended to be useful regardless of what Dungeons & Dragons edition one may be playing, this implies that Blackule Lane must have survived the destruction of most of Neverwinter during the storyline that took place in 4th-edition.
* The Starshine Academy
